verses.verse: And the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H3254>again<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>; and the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H5414>delivered<s%> them into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%>. did evil: Heb. added to commit, etc

And there was a <S%H259>certain<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H6881>Zorah<s%>, of the <S%H4940>family<s%> of the <S%H1839>Danites<s%>, whose <S%H8034>name<s%> was <S%H4495>Manoah<s%>; and his <S%H802>wife<s%> was <S%H6135>barren<s%>, and <S%H3205>bare<s%> not.

And the <S%H4397>angel<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H7200>appeared<s%> unto the <S%H802>woman<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%> unto her, Behold now, thou art <S%H6135>barren<s%>, and <S%H3205>bearest<s%> not: but thou shalt <S%H2029>conceive<s%>, and <S%H3205>bear<s%> a <S%H1121>son<s%>.
Now therefore <S%H8104>beware<s%>, I pray thee, and <S%H8354>drink<s%> not <S%H3196>wine<s%> nor strong <S%H7941>drink<s%>, and <S%H398>eat<s%> not any <S%H2931>unclean<s%> thing:

For, lo, thou shalt <S%H2030>conceive<s%>, and <S%H3205>bear<s%> a <S%H1121>son<s%>; and no <S%H4177>razor<s%> shall <S%H5927>come<s%> on his <S%H7218>head<s%>: for the <S%H5288>child<s%> shall be a <S%H5139>Nazarite<s%> unto <S%H430>God<s%> from the <S%H990>womb<s%>: and he shall <S%H2490>begin<s%> to <S%H3467>deliver<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> out of the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%>.

Then the <S%H802>woman<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> and <S%H559>told<s%> her <S%H376>husband<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, A <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> unto me, and his <S%H4758>countenance<s%> was like the <S%H4758>countenance<s%> of an <S%H4397>angel<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%>, <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H3372>terrible<s%>: but I <S%H7592>asked<s%> him not whence he was, neither <S%H5046>told<s%> he me his <S%H8034>name<s%>:

But he <S%H559>said<s%> unto me, Behold, thou shalt <S%H2030>conceive<s%>, and <S%H3205>bear<s%> a <S%H1121>son<s%>; and now <S%H7941>drink<s%> no <S%H3196>wine<s%> nor strong <S%H8354>drink<s%>, neither <S%H398>eat<s%> any <S%H2932>unclean<s%> thing: for the <S%H5288>child<s%> shall be a <S%H5139>Nazarite<s%> to <S%H430>God<s%> from the <S%H990>womb<s%> to the <S%H3117>day<s%> of his <S%H4194>death<s%>.

Then <S%H4495>Manoah<s%> <S%H6279>intreated<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H994>O<s%> my <S%H136>Lord<s%>, <S%H4994>let<s%> the <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> which thou didst <S%H7971>send<s%> come <S%H935>again<s%> unto us, and <S%H3384>teach<s%> us what we shall <S%H6213>do<s%> unto the <S%H5288>child<s%> that shall be <S%H3205>born<s%>.

And <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H8085>hearkened<s%> to the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of <S%H4495>Manoah<s%>; and the <S%H4397>angel<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> came <S%H935>again<s%> unto the <S%H802>woman<s%> as she <S%H3427>sat<s%> in the <S%H7704>field<s%>: but <S%H4495>Manoah<s%> her <S%H376>husband<s%> was not with her.

And the <S%H802>woman<s%> made <S%H4116>haste<s%>, and <S%H7323>ran<s%>, and <S%H5046>shewed<s%> her <S%H376>husband<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%> unto him, Behold, the <S%H376>man<s%> hath <S%H7200>appeared<s%> unto me, that <S%H935>came<s%> unto me the other <S%H3117>day<s%>.

And <S%H4495>Manoah<s%> <S%H6965>arose<s%>, and <S%H3212>went<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> his <S%H802>wife<s%>, and <S%H935>came<s%> to the <S%H376>man<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%> unto him, Art thou the <S%H376>man<s%> that <S%H1696>spakest<s%> unto the <S%H802>woman<s%>? And he <S%H559>said<s%>, I am.

And <S%H4495>Manoah<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, Now let thy <S%H1697>words<s%> come to <S%H935>pass<s%>. How shall we <S%H4941>order<s%> the <S%H5288>child<s%>, and how shall we <S%H4639>do<s%> unto him? How shall we order: Heb. What shall be the manner of the, etc how shall we do: or, what shall he do?: Heb. what shall be his work?
And the <S%H4397>angel<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H4495>Manoah<s%>, Of all that I <S%H559>said<s%> unto the <S%H802>woman<s%> let her <S%H8104>beware<s%>.

She may not <S%H398>eat<s%> of any thing that <S%H3318>cometh<s%> of the <S%H1612>vine<s%>, neither let her <S%H8354>drink<s%> <S%H3196>wine<s%> or strong <S%H7941>drink<s%>, nor <S%H398>eat<s%> any <S%H2932>unclean<s%> thing: all that I <S%H6680>commanded<s%> her let her <S%H8104>observe<s%>.

And <S%H4495>Manoah<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto the <S%H4397>angel<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, I pray thee, let us <S%H6113>detain<s%> thee, until we shall have made <S%H6213>ready<s%> a <S%H1423>kid<s%> <S%H5795><s%> <S%H6440>for<s%> thee. for thee: Heb. before thee

And the <S%H4397>angel<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H4495>Manoah<s%>, Though thou <S%H6113>detain<s%> me, I will not <S%H398>eat<s%> of thy <S%H3899>bread<s%>: and <S%H518>if<s%> thou wilt <S%H6213>offer<s%> a burnt <S%H5930>offering<s%>, thou must <S%H5927>offer<s%> it unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>. For <S%H4495>Manoah<s%> <S%H3045>knew<s%> not that he was an <S%H4397>angel<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>.

And <S%H4495>Manoah<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto the <S%H4397>angel<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, What is thy <S%H8034>name<s%>, that when thy <S%H1697>sayings<s%> come to <S%H935>pass<s%> we may do thee <S%H3513>honour<s%>?

And the <S%H4397>angel<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto him, Why <S%H7592>askest<s%> thou thus after my <S%H8034>name<s%>, seeing it is <S%H6383>secret<s%> <S%H6383><s%>? secret: or, wonderful

So <S%H4495>Manoah<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> a <S%H1423>kid<s%> <S%H5795><s%> with a meat <S%H4503>offering<s%>, and <S%H5927>offered<s%> it upon a <S%H6697>rock<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>: and the angel <S%H6213>did<s%> <S%H6381>wondrously<s%>; and <S%H4495>Manoah<s%> and his <S%H802>wife<s%> looked <S%H7200>on<s%>.

For it came to pass, when the <S%H3851>flame<s%> went <S%H5927>up<s%> toward <S%H8064>heaven<s%> from off the <S%H4196>altar<s%>, that the <S%H4397>angel<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H5927>ascended<s%> in the <S%H3851>flame<s%> of the <S%H4196>altar<s%>. And <S%H4495>Manoah<s%> and his <S%H802>wife<s%> looked <S%H7200>on<s%> it, and fell <S%H5307>on<s%> their <S%H6440>faces<s%> to the <S%H776>ground<s%>.

But the <S%H4397>angel<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> did no <S%H3254>more<s%> <S%H7200>appear<s%> to <S%H4495>Manoah<s%> and to his <S%H802>wife<s%>. Then <S%H4495>Manoah<s%> <S%H3045>knew<s%> that he was an <S%H4397>angel<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>.
And <S%H4495>Manoah<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto his <S%H802>wife<s%>, We shall <S%H4191>surely<s%> <S%H4191>die<s%>, because we have <S%H7200>seen<s%> <S%H430>God<s%>.

But his <S%H802>wife<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto him, <S%H3863>If<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> were <S%H2654>pleased<s%> to <S%H4191>kill<s%> us, he would not have <S%H3947>received<s%> a burnt <S%H5930>offering<s%> and a meat <S%H4503>offering<s%> at our <S%H3027>hands<s%>, neither would he have <S%H7200>shewed<s%> us all these things, nor would as at this <S%H6256>time<s%> have <S%H8085>told<s%> us such things as <S%H2063>these<s%>.

And the <S%H802>woman<s%> <S%H3205>bare<s%> a <S%H1121>son<s%>, and <S%H7121>called<s%> his <S%H8034>name<s%> <S%H8123>Samson<s%>: and the <S%H5288>child<s%> <S%H1431>grew<s%>, and the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1288>blessed<s%> him.

And the <S%H7307>Spirit<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H2490>began<s%> to move him at <S%H6470>times<s%> in the <S%H4264>camp<s%> of <S%H1835>Dan<s%> between <S%H6881>Zorah<s%> and <S%H847>Eshtaol<s%>. the camp: Heb. Mahanehdan
